alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Dukes; Eastern Plymouth; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:22AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms with heavy rainfall will impact portions of northern Dukes, Barnstable, southern Plymouth, southeastern Bristol, Newport and southeastern Bristol Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 620 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms moving northeast across south coastal Massachusetts around Westport and Dartmouth. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... New Bedford, Fall River, Plymouth, Barnstable, Dartmouth, Falmouth, Bristol, Brewster, Marion, Oak Bluffs, Tisbury, Yarmouth, Middleborough, Wareham, Sandwich, Bourne, Somerset, Portsmouth, Middletown, and Fairhaven. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Barnstable; Dukes; Eastern Plymouth; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth
